CustomField.formula: IF( Remarketing_Price_Full_Tax__c > 0, /* change 2022-07-05, SIX-342 Total_buy_price__c * 1.25 + Total_registration_tax__c, */ (Steel_price__c + Handling_Cost__c + Delivery__c) * 1.25 + License_Plate__c + Total_registration_tax__c, NULL )
CustomField.label: Total buy price - Full Tax
